Experience the evolution of clinical documentation with Orchid AI. Orchid’s Chrome Extension seamlessly integrates with all electronic health records (EHR) and telehealth solutions (like Google Meet or Doxy.me), making it the perfect companion for your healthcare practice.

📝 Empowering Clinicians with AI-Powered Documentation

With Orchid's AI clinical note generator, you get AI-powered progress notes and intake notes. Orchid AI goes beyond just clinical note generation; it's an invaluable tool for creating comprehensive treatment plans. Designed with healthcare professionals, mental health professionals, and top machine learning & natural language processing engineers, our platform ensures each treatment plan is crafted with precision and care. Adhering to the highest standards of data security, Orchid AI is not only HIPAA compliant but also dedicated to safeguarding patient information and their medical records both in & out of your therapy sessions. Whether it's developing a treatment plan or managing patient records, the mental health profession can trust Orchid AI for a secure, efficient, and compliant practice management solution.

🌐 Universal Compatibility: Whether you’re using an EHR or online telehealth platform outside of Orchid, Orchid’s extension integrates flawlessly with any healthcare industry software. Copy & paste your clinical notes directly from the same tab.

✍️ Edit & Sync Instantly: Modify your AI-powered progress notes in Orchid for real-time syncing with the Orchid AI browser extension, ensuring up-to-the-minute accuracy in your records.

⏱️ Effortless Setup: Get started in seconds! Orchid is user-friendly, fast, and intuitive. Simply sign in, click “Record Session,” and watch the AI transform your clinical documentation process.
